title: Iron oxide nanoparticles: a narrative review of in-depth analysis from neuroprotection to neurodegeneration
content:
Environ. Sci.: Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4VA00062E, Critical Review
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Ruchika Agarwal, Satadal Adhikary, Suchandra Bhattacharya, Sohini Goswami, Dipsikha Roy, Sohini Dutta, Abhratanu Ganguly, Sayantani Nanda, Prem Rajak
Iron oxide nanoparticles (IONPs) are ubiquitous in nature. They can play dual functions, one in neuroprotection and other in neurodegeneration.
